Home.bottleneck: CLS risk and TBT due to unnecessary lazy loading of LocalReputationPanel
Home.fix: Replaced lazy-loaded LocalReputationPanelWrapper with static LocalReputationPanel in app/page.tsx.
Home.expected_impact: Eliminated CLS risk from placeholder height mismatch. Reduced hydration cost (TBT) by removing LazySection wrapper. Improved SEO by including content in initial HTML.
Home.verification: Manual code verification confirming the removal of LazySection and direct rendering of LocalReputationPanel. Build failed due to unrelated 'dicom-parser' error, preventing bundle size verification.

Location.notes: Location pages use client-side map embedding with 'click to load' pattern, which is good for performance.

Condition.notes: Condition pages are static server components with some dynamic imports (videos). TrustProof component is imported statically but is a client component.

Appointment.notes: Appointment page lazy loads heavy components (PatientPortal, ChatBot), which is good.
